snippet.title: Lily's Well - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Lily's Well is a retro-styled horror game about a little girl named Lily. After hearing a cry for help coming out of the well outside her window, she decides to do the right thing and assemble a rope to climb down and save them.

Play it now!
Itch.io: https://pureiceblue.itch.io/lilys-well
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1834870/Lilys_Well/

Depending on how long Lily makes her rope and what materials she uses, the fate of Lily will change. There are of course other fates for those who want Lily to think outside the box. :)

If anyone wants to be mentioned in the game's patron section upon release, please support me on Patreon.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pureiceblue
Newgrounds: https://pureiceblue.newgrounds.com/
Itch.io: https://pureiceblue.itch.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceWoodrick
